@appShortName.description: The short-version name of the extension name

@appDesc.message: A floating scientific calculator anywhere you need it

@testMarkup.message:
Hello world

This is the language of the web

Open_the_calculator_inside_a_page_or_a_s.message: Open the calculator inside a page or a side panel or standalone window.

The_width_of_the_calculator_when_it_laun.message: The width of the calculator when it launches.

The_height_of_the_calculator_when_it_lau.message: The height of the calculator when it launches.

Extension_will_not_run_on_these_sites__E.message: Extension will not run on these sites. Enter one site per line.

Where_possible__renders_the_result_as_a_.message: Where possible, renders the result as a fraction instead of decimal.

The_number_of_decimal_places_that_answer.message: The number of decimal places that answers are round up to.

Launch_calculator_in_basic_mode__no_trig.message: Launch calculator in basic mode (no trigonometric functions).

Displays_a_control__in_the_header__for_m.message: Displays a control (in the header) for minimizing the calculator

Give_the_interface_a_dark_look_.message: Give the interface a dark look.
